ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Help, please!
ygData.msgSnippet: hello wish, what kind of video card are you using? if you call tech support for eq they refer you to the www.guru3d.com site where you can find all the latest
ygData.messageBody:
hello wish,

what kind of video card are you using? if you call
tech support for eq they refer you to the
www.guru3d.com site where you can find all the latest
video card drivers, also if your computer supports an
up grade i suggest getting a new video card with at
least 32 mb of ram , mine is 64 mb ddr and it runs
sweet, also at least 256 mb of system ram cuz eq is a
ram hog. its recomends the use of a p2-450 mhz i
suggest somewhere in the line of 1 gygaherz so that
way your graphic and your connectivity dont lag. also
see if you can afford it and your pc supports it get
512 mb of ram installed. cuz when you up grade to
luclin and the pop expansions youl need the extra ram
so get them asap. if you have any further questions,
dont hesitate to ask, im a network engineer, and i
know my stuff. well as for the rest of my fellow
norrathians ill be getting a new account soon and i
will rejoin the cause of ridding the world of the
orcish invasion. in all its zones.

- leo
aka Odraneol Buffmeister
Banned Level 33 Shammy
Druzzil Ro Server
Shadows of Conquest

-- Luis Binnier <shannara200@...> wrote:
> It sounds like your video card may not be right.
> What
> is the video card in your computer?
>
> Luis
>
>
> --- wish_sanscoeur <no_reply@yahoogroups.com> wrote:
> > hi there! I was wondering if ANYONE could help me
> > out. I had
> > everquest a LONG time ago (it's such a GREAT game)
> > but then my mom
> > threw it out, basically. I haven't had it for a
> few
> > years now but I
> > bought the "Everquest Trilogy" just a few weeks
> out.
> > Now i'm having
> > some problems and I just don't understand...
> >
> > I have all the requirements for the game,
> including
> > DirectX 8.1. BUT,
> > the game WON'T start! It keeps saying "3D not
> > available." Can
> > ANYONE help me out? We have 3D, directX 8.1, the
> > requirements...
> > But it won't work... anyone have any ideas at all?
>
> > I really don't
> > want to return this game... I would luv yah if
> you'd
> > help me! Thanks!
> >
> > Hugs and Kisses,
> > Wish
> >
> >
>
>
